scripts.build: yarn prep:rinkeby && graph codegen && graph build
scripts.deploy:rinkeby: yarn prep:rinkeby && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs bulla-network/bulla-contracts-rinkby
scripts.deploy:polygon: yarn prep:polygon && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs bulla-network/bulla-contracts-polygon
scripts.deploy:gnosis: yarn prep:gnosis && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs bulla-network/bulla-contracts-gnosis
scripts.deploy:avalanche: yarn prep:avalanche && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs bulla-network/bulla-contracts-avalanche
scripts.deploy:celo: yarn prep:celo && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs bulla-network/bulla-contracts-celo
